r.s: PEAR implementation of the OAuth 1.0a specification
r.d: Allows the use of the consumer and provider angles of the OAuth 1.0a specification
r.n: * Added storage interface for consumers, including Cache_Lite driver * Fixed #17701 (Strict Standards Notice) * Fixed #17653 (HTTP_OAuth_Consumer_Request converts + to %20) * Fixed #17567 (Changes to support OAuth Session 1.0 Draft 1) * Added additional error constants and maps in HTTP_OAuth_Provider_Response
